response.overview: The first Naxi youth inspirational film "Searching for Snowy Mountain" is an original film by 10-year-old Yunnan children's writer Wu Yuexuan, a key project of the Communist Youth League's "Building Dreams in Lijiang". It tells the story of a pair of siblings living with their grandmother in a mountainous area of Yunnan's ethnic minorities, whose parents accidentally fell off a cliff while picking herbs and whose whereabouts are unknown, and who are said to be rescued by the God of Snow.
response.title: Journey to the Snowing Mountains
